mapper.insert: INSERT INTO research(research_id, emp_no, research_title, research_content, research_regdate, research_startdate, research_enddate, research_status) VALUES(research_seq.NEXTVAL, #{emp_no}, #{research_title}, #{research_content}, SYSDATE, TO_DATE(#{research_startdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{research_enddate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{research_status})
mapper.select: SELECT research_id, emp_no, research_title, research_content, research_regdate, research_startdate, research_enddate, research_status FROM research WHERE research_id=#{research_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question(question_no, research_id, question_content, question_num, question_category) VALUES(question_seq.NEXTVAL, #{research_id}, #{question_content}, #{question_num}, #{question_category})
INSERT INTO answer_option(answer_no, question_no, ans_option_content, ans_option_num) VALUES(answer_option_seq.NEXTVAL, question_seq.CURRVAL, #{ans_option_content}, #{ans_option_num})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM research r JOIN emp e ON r.emp_no=e.emp_no WHERE e.emp_no=#{emp_no}

SELECT r.research_id, e.emp_no, r.research_title, r.research_content, TO_CHAR(r.research_startdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') research_startdate, TO_CHAR(r.research_enddate,'YYYY-MM-DD') research_enddate, TO_CHAR(r.research_regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') research_regdate, r.research_status, q.question_no, q.question_content, q.question_num FROM research r JOIN emp e ON r.emp_no=e.emp_no JOIN question q ON r.research_id=q.research_id WHERE r.research_id=#{research_id}

SELECT r.research_id, q.question_no, q.question_content, q.question_num, ao.answer_no, ao.ans_option_content, ao.ans_option_num FROM research r JOIN emp e ON r.emp_no=e.emp_no JOIN question q ON r.research_id=q.research_id JOIN answer_option ao ON q.question_no=ao.question_no WHERE r.research_id=#{research_id} ORDER BY ao.ans_option_num
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO response(question_no, emp_no, response_date, multiple_choice) VALUES (#{question_no}, #{emp_no}, SYSDATE, #{multiple_choice})
mapper.select:
SELECT r.research_id, r.research_title, TO_CHAR(r.research_startdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') research_startdate, TO_CHAR(r.research_enddate,'YYYY-MM-DD') research_enddate, e.emp_name, r.research_status FROM research r JOIN emp e ON r.emp_no=e.emp_no WHERE r.research_status=0
AND ( r.research_startdate <= SYSDATE AND r.research_enddate > SYSDATE )
AND ( r.research_enddate < SYSDATE )
ORDER BY research_id DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM research r JOIN emp e ON r.emp_no=e.emp_no WHERE r.research_status=0
AND ( r.research_startdate <= SYSDATE AND r.research_enddate > SYSDATE )
AND ( r.research_enddate < SYSDATE )
ORDER BY research_id DESC
